column2: Helm Bishop's mitre Escutcheon Per bend sinister azure and argent, in the first, a fleur-de-lis argent, in the second, a heart enflamed pierced by an arrow bendwise sinister, all gules, upon a book proper. [ 196 ] Motto IN ILLO UNO UNUM ( Latin for 'In the One, [we are] one') Other elements Keys of Peter behind HH 's shield and papal mantling Symbolism Fleur-de-lis : Associated with the Virgin Mary , symbolizing purity and innocence. Augustinian emblem : Emblem of the Order of Saint Augustine , in reference to Leo XIV being a member of the Augustinian Order. This charge displays a red heart pierced by an arrow and resting on a closed book.
